content.rendered:
December 6th, 2022 

  Today is a “B” Day 
  

  

 Club Meetings and Information: December 6th, 2022 

 

The November Issue of the Mapletogian Newspaper is PUBLISHED- Check out the CLEVER Mapletogian APP to read our school news! There is LOTS of COOL stuff happening at Maple! 

Did you miss the hat and scarf sale outside of your cafeteria last week? We are having another 2-day sale on DECEMBER 6th and December 7th in all flex and lunch periods- Hats and scarves are 20 dollars- Stickers and sunglasses are 2 and dollars- this is CASH or CHECK only event – NO BLUESTREAK BUCKS will be accepted. 

Attention Ski Club members. There will be a mandatory ski club meeting on Tuesday, December 6 at 7:00 p.m. The meeting will take place on Zoom. The link to the meeting can be found on our Canvas club page and will be sent via Remind. Also…the final cut off for your West Mountain pass will be December 15. After that, prices will increase AND you will have to pay a late fee. See you on Tuesday on Zoom! 

Attention A Hand Up Club members. Please check our Canvas page for important information regarding our Adopt a Senior Project. We Look forward to seeing you at our next meeting, December 12th. 

International club will meet on Wednesday December 7 in room 275. All are welcome! 

There will be a yearbook meeting today after school. 

Student council is meeting on Wednesday in Rm 178 

Math Club will be meeting after school every Wednesday until our competition in February. All are welcome! 

Attention Adventure Gaming Club members, aka DnD club! We will be meeting this week on Wednesday, 12/7 from 2:35-3:05 in the library! See you there! 

   

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meeting dates and room information! 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND! 

make it a great day, or not… the choice is yours!
